title: Bad Day L.A
description:
Description


> Platform: PC

> Genre: Action / Adventure

> Screenshots: Here

> Developer: Enlight Software

> Publisher: Aspyr

> Year: 2006

> Recommended Age: Mature



Game:

In Bad Day L.A. Players are placed behind the cart of a homeless man who becomes a savior around Los Angeles. Anthony Williams was a film agent who has gone a long time and now lives in his own world of isolation and depression, but now it will be necessary to save the city where he lives because he was attacked by zombies, terrorists, and also It has terrible earthquakes. Ultimately, your character will have to cope with all difficulties and to cope with a really bad day in LA



System requirements:

Minimum:

- 3D Hardware Accelerator Card Required - 100% DirectX 9.0 compatible 64 MB with latest drivers

- English version of Microsoft Windows 2000/XP

- Intel Pentium 4 1.6 GHz or AMD Sempron 2800 +

- 512 MB RAM

- DirectX 9.0 compatible sound card

-Windows 2000/XP compatible mouse and keyboard with latest drivers

- 8x speed CD-ROM drive or 4X DVD-ROM drive



Recommended:

- Windows XP

- Intel Pentium D 2.0 GHz or AMD Athlon 64 2800 + or higher

- 1 GB RAM

- Geforce 5700 or Radeon 9700 or better 3D Accelerator


Install Notes:
1. Mount or extract ISO with MagicISO or Daemon Tool.
2. Install.
3. Copy the cracked in your place.
4. Play the game.
